inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.description: Track and manage your inventory batches, expiration dates, and stock levels.

batches.title: Manage Product Batches
batches.description: Track and manage your inventory batches, expiration dates, and stock levels.

stockIn.title: Stock In Records
stockIn.description: View all stock additions to your inventory

stockOut.title: Stock Out Records
stockOut.description: View all stock removals from your inventory

batchDeleteDialog.title: Delete Batch
batchDeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete batch
batchDeleteDialog.permanentRemove: This action will permanently remove this batch and its initial stock-in record.
batchDeleteDialog.pleaseWait: Please wait while we check if this batch can be deleted.
batchDeleteDialog.hasTransactions: This batch cannot be deleted because it has associated transactions or stock movements. Only batches that haven't been used in any transactions or stock adjustments can be deleted.
batchDeleteDialog.quantityChanged: This batch cannot be deleted because its current quantity
batchDeleteDialog.actionUndone: This will permanently remove the batch and its initial stock-in record. This action cannot be undone.
batchDeleteDialog.cannotDeleteMessage: This batch cannot be deleted as it has associated transactions or stock movements.

batchDetailDialog.title: Batch Details
batchDetailDialog.description: Detailed information about the product batch

batchAdjustmentDialog.title: Adjust Quantity
batchAdjustmentDialog.adjustmentPlaceholder: Enter adjustment (positive to add, negative to subtract)
batchAdjustmentDialog.provideReason: Please provide a reason for the adjustment
batchAdjustmentDialog.adjustmentSuccess: Batch quantity has been adjusted successfully

batchFormDialog.createDescription: Add a new product batch to your inventory
batchFormDialog.batchCodeNote: Batch code is auto-generated but can be edited if needed
batchFormDialog.buyPriceNote: Total purchase price for the entire batch, not per unit
batchFormDialog.unitAutoSelected: Unit is automatically selected based on the product.

tooltips.product: Select the product you're adding inventory for
tooltips.batchCode: Unique code to identify this batch. Auto-generated based on product name and date
tooltips.expiryDate: The date when this product batch expires. Important for inventory management
tooltips.initialQuantity: The number of items in this batch. This will increase the product's total stock
tooltips.buyPrice: The purchase price for the ENTIRE batch, not per unit. Used to calculate profit margins
tooltips.unit: The unit of measurement for this product (e.g., pieces, boxes)
tooltips.supplier: The supplier who provided this batch (optional)
